title: Shell Undergraduate Scholarship Scheme 2024
descriptionMd: The Shell Petroleum Development Company of Nigeria Limited (SPDC) Joint Venture (JV) announces its annual National University Scholarship Programme, aimed at promoting academic excellence and enhancing the employability of young Nigerians.

title: Google Summer of Code 2025
descriptionMd: Google Summer of Code is a global, online program focused on bringing new contributors into open source software development. GSoC Contributors work with an open source organization on a 12+ week programming project under the guidance of mentors.

title: MTN Foundation Scholarship Scheme 2024
descriptionMd: The MTN Foundation Scholarship Scheme is an annual scholarship award that seeks to attract high performing full-time second-year students studying Science & Technology related courses in Nigerian public tertiary institutions.

title: KWASU SU Research Grant Call for Applications
descriptionMd: The KWASU Students' Union is pleased to announce a call for applications for its inaugural student research grant. This grant aims to support innovative research projects by undergraduate and postgraduate students across all faculties.
